summary: Well it back with help of some folks on forums i completed it
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple scripted quest mod i not going spoil it to much only 1 bug i know of n ur journal doesnt display the villian\'s name but u get a mark that leads you to them.

try it out just dont forget to loot the corpse

location: embershard mine (if u can read the note or follower markers)

Requirements dawngaurd and u guess it apachiiskyhair(i dont even know why he wearing a helm lol)

i spend a hot min try figure scripts n such so enjoy it... off topic they a spellsword 20+ level range

another bug if u near him dont try god mode it crash (oh it did on me newho it completed i fine tune later maybe add more not sure yet
forgot to say sleep at a inn or pass time so courier gives u the note
not sure if skse is needed
author: OZZY
